definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Walk around the city, peruse the menu, and sit down for a meal.
sentences.chinese: 步行遊覽城市，細讀的菜單，並坐下來喫飯。

sentences.english: Germont stopped laughing and sat down.
sentences.chinese: 熱爾芒特止住大笑並坐了下來。
